name: Dead Hunter
detailed_description:
Dead Hunter is a game in the action genre with a top view, made in 2D style.
In the game Dead Hunter you're playing for the demon hunter which deals with the destruction of evil creatures.
Defeat the ancient evil!

Test your strength in the arena, where you have to fend off hordes of monsters wave after wave.
Each subsequent wave will be more and more difficult.
If you can hold out until the end, you have to fight with a unique boss.
Use boxes with ammunition, which appear every second wave,
replenish ammunition and health. Be careful, each enemy requires its own approach.
Do you have enough strength to withstand all the tests and reach the end in this difficult battle?

Features:
  • Multiple arenas
  • Each arena has its own boss
  • Compare your score with other players
  • Dynamic gameplay
  • A lot of enemies
